title: Lancz Finding Bargains, Apple’s Face ID Purchase, Neiman Marcus Christmas
itunes:title: Lancz Finding Bargains, Apple’s Face ID Purchase, Neiman Marcus Christmas
description:
Alan Lancz, Research Director at LanczGlobal.com, talks about stocks he likes. Mark Gurman, Bloomberg News Technology Reporter, discusses on Apple’s investment in facial recognition. Mimi Sterling, VP of Corporate Communications at Neiman Marcus, describes the luxury goodies from the 2017 Christmas Book. And Carol and Pimm Fox hit today’s Movers and Shakers on Wall Street, and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his “Stock of the Day.” 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
